title: Wolf Tooth B-Rad Everywhere Base adds two or three bolt mounts anywhere on your bike
content:
Want to carry more stuff on your bike but don’t have any more mounts? Wolf Tooth is once again coming to the rescue. Expanding on the excellent B-RAD Strap Base, the new B-RAD Everywhere Bases add the ability to run three bolt accessories for increased cargo capabilities. It may not look like much, but the […]

The post Wolf Tooth B-Rad Everywhere Base adds two or three bolt mounts anywhere on your bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
